An employer employing one hundred (100) or more employees in the District ofolumbia shall provide each employee not less than one (1) hour of paid leaveor each thirty-seven (37) hours worked, not to exceed seven (7) days of paideave per calendar year. An employer employing from twenty-five (25) to ninety-nine (99) employees in theistrict of Columbia shall provide each employee with not less than one (1) houraid leave for every forty-three (43) hours worked, not to exceed five (5) daysf paid leave per calendar year. An employer employing twenty-four (24) or fewer employees in the District ofolumbia shall provide not less than one (1) hour of paid leave for everyighty-seven (87) hours worked, not to exceed three (3) days of paid leave peralendar year.
